A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Visually stunning. Especially in 3d. Love the Kylo-Rey-Luke arc. The rest not so much. Plot\, was weak\, too many charachters\, too many directions\, thin bad guys\, a MacGuffin that is useless\, Duex ex plot devices and flying Leia? It was good\, not great. For once\, can I see a Star Wars film where some creature doesn't burp or fart? 30 minutes side visit to a casino was useless. Snoke was the new Darth Maul. Phasma was the new Boba Fett. Finn the new Han Solo. Yeah\, the writing was that weak.
